entries.meaning: (US, slang) A female teacher, especially one seen to be old-fashioned and extremely severe and strict.
(by extension) Someone who acts like a schoolmarm; a person acting harsh and stern.
(forestry) A tree with two or more trunks; a forked tree.

verbs.description: schoolmarm (third-person singular simple present schoolmarms, present participle schoolmarming, simple past and past participle schoolmarmed)

entries.meaning: (transitive, US, slang) To discipline in the manner of a schoolmarm; to harshly reprimand or chide.
